```
svgPanZoom(
  svgPlot({
    returns %>>%
      (cumprod( 1 + . )) %>>%
      (.[endpoints(.,"months")]) %>>%
      ( ./lag(.,k=1) - 1 ) %>>%
      chart.SnailTrail(
        colorset = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(9,"Set1")[-6]
        ,add.names="none"
        ,width = 36
        ,step = 36
        ,legend.loc = "topright"
      )
  },height= 10, width = 16)
)
```
